name: Cascade Greenhouse
description:
This was made for Mini Jam 104: Cascade, my first ever attempt at a Game Jam. It was a lot of fun!

The roof of your greenhouse has broken. Use the falling raindrops to grow plants and make enough money to repair it. You only have until the storm ends.

How to Play:

Buy seeds from the store. Green plants grow fast, orange plants grow at a medium rate and red plants are slower. Once your plants are fully grown, sell them for a profit.

If you buy star stickers, they tell you when your plant is fully grown. Other items may help too.
